title: Mayura Vaddanam: Exquisite Peacock Design Gold Waist Belt
materials: meticulously handcrafted using traditional Telugu goldsmithing techniques. The piece features an exquisite Hyderabadi polish
enhancing the gold's natural luster and depth.
features: This Vaddanam features intricate filigree work and a prominent peacock (Mayura) motif, symbolizing grace, beauty, and royalty. The piece showcases traditional nakshi work, depicting floral and paisley patterns with exceptional detail. The adjustable design ensures a comfortable and secure fit. The bottom edge is adorned with small golden droplet-shaped danglers which contribute to the Vaddanam's regal appearance.
colors: reflecting the rich heritage of South Indian jewelry.
occasions: and special occasions where a touch of timeless elegance is desired. This piece also complements modern ethnic wear for upscale events.
description: This Vaddanam is a masterpiece of South Indian craftsmanship, embodying cultural heritage and timeless beauty. The intricate details and superior gold quality make it a valuable heirloom piece, passed down through generations. Its design resonates with traditional symbolism, making it auspicious for significant life events.
